#summary Introduction

= Introduction =
From the [http://www.cgal.org CGAL] project website:

  The goal of the CGAL Open Source Project is to provide easy access to efficient and reliable geometric algorithms in the form of a C++ library

When compiling the [http://www.cgal.org/download.html CGAL source code], it is compiled to a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Static_library static library].

Unfortunately, binding other languages, such as Java or Python, to CGAL is not possible as most binding frameworks require a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dynamic-link_library dynamic-link library].

This project aims to provide a .dll for CGAL.
